dublin_core.dcvalue: Handheld devices are becoming more cost effective to own and their use in healthcare environments is increasing Handheld devices currently are being used for e prescribing charge capture and accessing daily schedules and reference tools Future applications may include education on medications dictation order entry and test results reporting Selecting the right handheld device requires careful analysis of current and future applications as well as vendor expertise It is important to recognize the technology will continue to evolve over the next three years
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T18:14:40Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2002-01-24
Healthcare financial management : journal of the Healthcare Financial Management Association
Mobile computing acceptance grows as applications evolve.
